name: Rail-it!
description:
Rail-it!

Frenetic multiplayer couch co-op game about fixing train’s railroad!

Play alone or with your friends this local co-op prototype!

Get resources, build materials, and fix the railroad! Don't spare any time and cooperate with your teammates to repair the railroad before trains arrive.

Gather resources!

Chop trees and mine iron rocks to gather resources.

Build materials!

Build wooden planks and iron rails from the gathered resources.

Fix the railroad!

Before the trains arrive! Don't spare any time!

Cooperate with your Team!

Make plans, change your plans, and yell!
